page.title: 20ACKNOWLEGEMENTS
page.content:
This entry has been complied by 150 second year pupils at the Ferrers School during their Environmental Studies Lessons.
The pupils would like to thank the E.S. Faculty and the Computer Department for all their assistance, advice and above all, patience in helping to load the information.
Many thanks also to the mayor of Higham Ferrers, John White's, Grensons, the vicar, the landlord of the Star & Garter, residents of John White's Close, and the many local residents who agreed to be interviewed and who so kindly gave up their time.
